abstract: Giants like Goldman Sachs and Bank of America are trading at well below the valuation of other large companies, but even bargain hunters are wary.
snippet: Giants like Goldman Sachs and Bank of America are trading at well below the valuation of other large companies, but even bargain hunters are wary.
lead_paragraph: Michael Scanlon is tempted by bank stocks, truly he is.

headline.main: Bank Shares Take a Beating, and It May Not Be Over Yet
headline.print_headline: Bank Shares Take a Beating, and It May Not Be Over Yet

abstract: Glenn F. Tilton has been named chairman of JPMorgan Chase’s Midwest business, succeeding William M. Daley, who left the bank to become White House chief of staff.
snippet: Glenn F. Tilton has been named chairman of JPMorgan Chase’s Midwest business, succeeding William M. Daley, who left the bank to become White House chief of staff.
lead_paragraph: Glenn F. Tilton, a former chief executive of United Airlines, has been named chairman of JPMorgan Chase‘s Midwest business, succeeding William M. Daley, who left the bank this year to become White House chief of staff. Mr. Tilton, 63, will also be a member of the bank’s executive committee.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Former United Airlines Chief

abstract: Barclays Capital has promoted Greg Dalvito and Richard Hardegree to be the firm’s co-heads of technology mergers and acquisitions.
snippet: Barclays Capital has promoted Greg Dalvito and Richard Hardegree to be the firm’s co-heads of technology mergers and acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: Barclays Capital has promoted Greg Dalvito and Richard Hardegree to be the firm’s co-heads of technology mergers and acquisitions.

headline.main: Barclays Names Co-Heads for Tech M.&A.
